resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81788</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81788</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9776</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">What Age? - Interactive Questioning</string>
            <string language="es">¿A qué edad? - Cuestionario interactivo</string>
            <string language="ga">Cén Aois? - Ceistiúchán Idirghníomhach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welches Alter? - Interaktives Ausfragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel Âge ? - Interrogation Interactive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que Idade? - Questionar Interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che Età? - Interrogazione Interattiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποια ηλικία; - Διαλογική επερώτηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Develop a positive attitude towards Irish and develop a interest in it. To enjoy learning Irish. The pupil will have a positive attitude towards Irish and will develop an interest in it. The pupil will enjoy learning in Irish.</string>
            <string language="es">Desarrolla una actitud positiva y un interés por el irlandés. Para disfrutar con el aprendizaje del irlandés. El alumno tendrá una actitud positiva y un interés por el irlandés. El alumno disfrutará aprendiendo el irlandés.</string>
            <string language="ga">Dearcadh dearfach i leith na Gaeilge agus spéis agus dúil inti a chothú. Taitneamh a bheith le baint as foghlaim na Gaeilge.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entwickeln Sie eine positive einstellung 
gegenüber Iren und entwickeln Sie ein Interesse an ihm. Iren, 
zu erlernen genießen. Die Pupille hat eine positive einstellung
gegenüber Iren und entwickelt ein Interesse an ihr. Die 
Schüler genießt, auf Iren zu erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Développez une attitude positive envers 
l'Irlandais et développez un intérêt dans lui. Pour avoir 
plaisir à apprendre l'irlandais. La pupille aura une attitude 
positive envers l'Irlandais et développera un intérêt dans elle. 
L'élève aura plaisir à apprendre dans l'Irlandais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenvolva uma atitude positiva para o irish e 
desenvolva um interesse nele. Para apreciar aprender o irish. 
A pupila terá uma atitude positiva para o irish e desenvolverá
um interesse nela. O aluno apreciará aprender no irish.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sviluppi un atteggiamento positivo nei confronti 
dell'Irlandese e sviluppigli un interesse. Per godere imparare 
l'Irlandese. La pupilla avrà un atteggiamento positivo nei 
confronti dell'Irlandese e gli svilupperà un interesse. 
L'allievo godrà imparare nell'Irlandese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναπτύξτε μια θετική στάση απέναντι στα ιρλανδικά και
αναπτύξτε ένα ενδιαφέρον για την. Για να απολαύσουν τα 
ιρλανδικά. Ο μαθητής θα έχει μια θετική στάση απέναντι στα
ιρλανδικά και θα αναπτύξει ένα ενδιαφέρον για την. Ο 
μαθητής θα απολαύσει στα ιρλανδικά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
